name: Project Humanity
description:
This is a school project.

To quit game Alt + F4

WASD for movement

L Shift for Sprint

L Click for Shooting

R Click for HookShot

For Wall Running just Run straight to the respective place

Textures from https://www.deviantart.com/llexandro/gallery/80813556/high-quality-textures-02

Tipo de letra https://www.dafont.com/disolve.font?l[]=10&l[]=1&text=Project+Humanity

Music from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sisGSwT2eN0

Assets use.
